version_description:
- It solves a problem with image orientation.

- Don't forget to join our Facebook group for support, requests and coming updates!
- Don't forget to rate the app and tell about it to your friend..it keeps it going!

-Display->Histogram
- Video Save: Trim & Save

- Double tapping on an adjust slider will reset it's value
- Beautiful CINE presets

Thanks so much for your support, ideas and nice reviews!
Please, don't forget to tell your colorist friends about this little app!

Solves a problem when trying to open an image that is not a LUT table.
Many thanks to Hürcan Emre Yılmazer and Hitesh Patel for an important change in the color space handling.
Please, if you like the app, tell your friends about it!
Solves an issue when videos are located at iCloud

Solves a problem when saving portrait oriented images. Thanks so much to David Onuora for reporting and helping me with this.
Now you can reorder your luts. Just drag to folders, create new folders, drag and drop for order your folder. Your folders will appear under "Imported"
Solves a problem with anamorphic video. Thanks to Brian Westfield.
Solves a serious bug when ordering the imported luts in folders.
Solves a problem when exporting cubes 32

iPhone X, portrait mode support (HSL curves available only in Landscape)
HSL curves applied before the LUT (I will let you control this in next version)
It solves a problem with layout in landscape while displaying video, thanks so much to  György Balla!

Now you can import and export .cube files from / to iCloud and other online storage services.
For importing use menu: Import or Admin:Import.Imported files will appear under Imported->.CUBE
For exporting current LUT: use Save: Export cube 16 or 32.
Solves a problem with the menu

- Solves a problem with the camera in iPhone X
- Solves a problem when exporting cubes to iCloud while processing videos.

Some important info when exporting cubes to DropBox:
You have to enable DropBox in Files app:
1. Open Files App
2. Enable the switch besides DropBox (personal) It has to be green, enabled
3. Press Done on top
4. Close Video LUT if open / Open Video LUT
5. Select your LUT,
6. Happy exporting!

In Settings App search for Video LUT, there are new 2 switches:

- Enable 4K recording with the camera if available in your device
- Change Camera to OpenGL renderer if you have problems displaying the camera.

Camera changes:
- Alternative camera view for iPhone X by default, as it solves some issues. (You can still switch at Settings app->VideoLUT)
- 4K recording by default (if available in your device)
- Tap for focus
Camera: Tap again on a selected preset for controlling the LUT intensity.

Removes erroneous slider when editing video files.
(Use Menu->Adjustments, Opacity slider instead)

- You can change now the name of any imported LUTs: Organize->Tap on the name of any imported LUT
- 4 types of mask
- Balance color wheels
- New LUTS (more LUTs at CINE and 3 new groups of conversions LUTS, specially for handling LOG)
- Some fixes for the lut name when saving the LUTs to the cloud.

You are welcome to join our FB group for requests as I improve and add new features.
All requests will be handled!
Also follow me at Instagram @videolut
+ don't forget to put me some stars here :)

- Support for .zip files from Import (cloud icon)
You can have different folders in the zip but just keep one level (no folders inside folders)
Files inside the folders can be .cube or .3dl

- Keeps the photo / video picker in latest position (album etc)
- Keeps the metadata when the original image was a JPEG or HIEC (HIEC is saved as max quality JPEG)
- Shares the images (no just saves to library)
- Exposure slider problem solved. (default value should be zero)
- When exporting LUTs as .cube keeps the name of the original LUT (only adds _16 and _32)
Solves some problems with the color wheels

- Split Toning
- HSL colors sliders (use them as an alternative to HSL curves)
RGB Curves find them at Adjust->Curves, scroll the bottom

- New LUTs by FiLMiC Pro: Added two new official conversion LUTs from FiLMiC Pro for processing their all-new Flat and LOG V2 gamma curves! Find them under Presets
- Double LUT: Now you can apply conversion LUTs to your creative LUTs on the fly! Find this feature under Adjust.
- Long press on the screen to display your original image

- Don't miss the two new official conversion LUTs from FiLMiC Pro for processing their all new Flat and LOG V2 gamma curves!
Find them under Presets -> CONVRT. Thanks to FiLMiC, it has been fantastic!

- "Organize" and "Import" have been merged. Now you can create or select a "custom" group and import the LUTs directly to it.
Use "Organize & Import" menu. Big thanks to Ferron Smith for this!

- Fixes a problem with Noise (Grain) in some devices.
- Fixes a problem with Split Tone.
- Fixes a problem with new images thumbnails update in the Media Picker.

Please join the Facebook group if you have problems or requests.

- You can rename groups now, thanks Ferron Smith for all these suggestions!
- Export your LUTs (multiple selections)
- Solves a problem when importing LUTs, thanks @ituber.10
Fixes a problem with the video encoder.

- Adjust->Denoise
- Fixes a problem when using imported cubes as "Second LUT"
Improved Adjust->denoise.

New Presets->Wavegod by Rahkim Bryant
Sticky Histogram
Solves a problem when opening Panasonic RAW images.
Adds Enhance2 and other presets
Fixes a problem with Presets
Batch Images feature (Menu->Batch)

Adds to Settings (search for VideoLUT at Settings app)
- Order imported LUTs alphabetically
- Skip resetting when importing videos and images

Marker when an adjustment has changed.
Minor UI fixes.

Adjust->LAB Curves
Improvements in Adjust->Split

- CMYK Curves
- Save internally the adjustments as a LUT in a group.
Fixes some problems with presets.

More CONVERT LUTs (40+)
Use these at Adjust->Set->Second LUT when necessary!
If you have any other LUT that you want to be included just send it over!
Small fix in the menu, as it had swapped Organize&Import vs. Transfer
Solves a problem with the split filter

1. Changes the order of operations to Convert LUT->Adjusts->LUT, before it was: Adjusts->Convert LUT->LUT
(if you want to revert to the old order there is a switch in the Settings app, search for VideoLUT)


2. 14 New conversion LUTs proposed by FB group members.


3. Solves a problem when exporting LUTs.

Thanks to all of you that helped with this release: Justin Tran, Rick Yaeger, and Glenn Upgraded.


Please join our FB group if you have not done it yet!
Waveform: If available in your device, use the histogram option and then the left button in the histogram view for changing the mode to the waveform.
Neon presets

- LUT intensity. (Touch down an already selected preset) It affects only the LUT. (kind of the same as it works on the camera)
There is also an "Overall Intensity" in Adjusts but that one affects all adjustments.
This LUT intensity value is also registered in Profiles, in the same way as any adjustment, so if you use profiles just remember that.

- RGB parade in supported devices.

Very grateful to all of you at the Facebook group! Big thanks to Glenn Upgraded for requesting many of these features.

In total more than 150 new presets:
Added new Wavegod presets by Rahkim Brown, Instagram: @wavegodphotography
Added new Enhance2, Byron, Shelley, Duotone2, Stone, Lomage, and Divided presets.
Some improvements on the waveform.

- Shares CUBE x33 for Arri tool.
- Share LUTs to other apps.

Many thanks to Arun Kumar Pandey for requests and improvements!
Direct contact for requests: enriqueg@gmail.com

- Film grain for video. Save the video using "Encode and Save" with a high rate for keeping the grain.
Be aware many third party app will compress your video files affecting how grain is displayed.
I very much appreciate your help, Glenn Upgraded, and Kamalky Laureano!
Some fixes when opening images
Some fixes in Organizer. Many thanks to Brett Portaro!
Vectorscope

Alternative media picker (Use Settings app for choosing)
Solves a problem with colors when processing videos
New presets

This version solves a problem with Open-> LUT Image.
Thanks so much to Jean Luc Haurais for the feedback!

Don't hesitate to contact for ideas or issues: enriqueg@gmail.com

Solves a problem when comparing video before vs after (long press on the video player)
Settings=>Keep EXIF dates
If you have any issues or feature requests contact directly: enriqueg@gmail.com
Solves a problem with media picker
Better preset selection
Fixes a problem with presets selection.
Favorites
Solves a problem when selecting presets on the camera
Camera update, if you have any problems with it just use the Settings app, Video LUT and choose Simple Camera for reverting to the old one.
Wavegod 2 LUTs by Rahkim Brown
Fixes a problem with Wavegod2->Stone preset
Thumbs by the current image. Also, Crop for images.
Fixes a problem with thumbnails
Solves a problem with Crop.
Showcase feature
Clarity, White Vignette
Adjusts->Levels, 3DL files support for importing in Admin.
Masks
Solves a problem with images and masks

- Improves HSL Curves.
- Fixes a problem when shooting RAW photos.
Fixes a problem with profiles
Fixes a problem with HSL curves
Infrared presets by @wavegodphotography

CYBERPUNK presets by @wilmer.lens

Wilmer Martinez is a photographer who loves turning NYC into a cyberpunk dystopian city.
Please check his IG for more images: @wilmer.lens
Favorites in landscape mode and batch.

HSL fixes
Add favorites presets on Camera.

- Pick color mask for images
- P3 support for images
It solves a problem when playing videos
Fixes a problem with color mask.
Fixes a problem with Masks
Fixes an issue with HSL tool.
Fixes an issue with masks and saving profiles
Fixes a problem with the media picker. You can always choose the classic media picker at Settings App - Video LUT options
Fixes a problem with the image render
Solves. problem when changing the camera orientation
It solves a problem when playing videos in some devices.
Auto White Balance (find it at Adjusts)
Solves a problem when picking colours for AWB.
Solves a problem when importing ProRaw images.

Supports Macbeth chart (24 colors) automatic detection and color correction for images and videos. Just use Adjust -> Chart. 
Be sure to that the chart is visible when you press the Detect button. As usually, you can export the generated color correction as a LUT.
Better Vignette, adds DGK 18 colors chart detection, fixes thumbnails for batch.

- Includes AWB adjustment in exported LUT
- Added FilmicPRO v3 LUTs (to CONVRT group)
- Some improvements on Match
Corrected display of HDR videos. (Note that when saving HDR videos you always have to use HEIV at Encode & Save )
Solves a problem with .cube files when handling HDR videos.
Improves saved image quality.
Solves a problem with Levels adjustment.

Added support for Spanish and Chinese. 
Fixes a problem with Showcase
Support for Russian, Italian, Japanese and French.
Fixes a problem when formatting .cube files.
Solves a problem with presets
Added access to Files for Images and Videos.
Improves HDR Video workflow.
Support for German, Portuguese and Korean.

Adds Settings to Open->Info.
Adjust->Channel Mixer
Solves a problem when applying Menu->Profiles.
Adds Vectorscope and waveform to old devices.
Adjust->Combine
Simplifies Adjust->Combine interface.
Camera update: Grids and Histogram
Menu->Match  better colors transfer.
Adds Camera presets
Solves a problem with the Favorites thumbnails
Solves a problem when rendering HDR video.
Adds support for Video Passport (Adjust->Calibrate)
